package.name: cuckoo_time_translator
package.description: This library intends to do most of the dirty work required within a device driver that emoploys one way device time translation. This includes: * handling the one way translator * sending special timing messages (DeviceTimestamp) for debugging and evaluation (e.g. with ctt_introspect in the cuckoo_time_translator_python package) * provide dynamic configuration for the one way translation algorithm
package.author: Hannes Sommer
